channel.title: Miller, Frank on Chege's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Miller, Frank on Chege's Blog

item.title: Daredevil: Born Again (1986)
item.description: Daredevil: Born Again (1986). Credits: marvel.com Daredevil: Born Again. Frank Miller; David Mazzuchelli. www.marvel.com . www.hoopladigital.com . marvel.fandom.com . 1986. Accessed Mar 6, 2023. Snapshots [Matt] Dust… The dust is thick. Could choke on it… There’s nothing left. So you know. So that’s why. I never would have connected it to you. Nothing about it said gangster – until this.
